channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Empowering every developer with trusted Microsoft insights

item.title: 【MSVC Compiler Language Updates in Visual Studio 2022 version 17.12】Visual Studio 2022 版本 17.12 中的 MSVC 编译器语言更新
item.description: 【Introduction In alignment with the Visual Studio 2022 version 17.12 release, and based upon feedback received from the community, the MSVC compiler team would like to provide greater visibility into the C++ language-level fixes for customer-reported issues that made it into the release. This is similar to how the standard library team publishes regular changelogs […]】简介 为了与 Visual Studio 2022 版本 17.12 版本保持一致，并根据从社区收到的反馈，MSVC 编译器团队希望为该版本中客户报告的问题提供更深入的 C++ 语言级修复的可见性。这类似于标准库团队发布定期变更日志的方式 [...]

item.title: 【Deletion of Outdated Azul Zulu for Azure Container Images for Better Security】删除过时的 Azure 容器映像 Azul Zulu 以提高安全性
item.description: 【We at Microsoft are committed to providing customers with a secure ecosystem of tools for building and deploying applications. As part of this commitment, we continuously update our Java container image offerings to ensure they meet the highest security standards. Back in January 2022, we announced the End of Updates for the Azul Zulu for Azure build of OpenJDK. As […]】Microsoft 致力于为客户提供用于构建和部署应用程序的安全工具生态系统。作为这一承诺的一部分，我们不断更新我们的 Java 容器镜像产品，以确保它们符合最高的安全标准。早在 2022 年 1 月，我们就宣布停止更新 OpenJDK 的 Azul Zulu for Azure 版本。作为 […]

item.title: 【Why a Unified Data Model is Critical: Lessons from Building Microsoft’s Semantic Layer】为什么统一数据模型至关重要：构建 Microsoft 语义层的经验教训
item.description: 【Introduction Some years ago, we were wrestling with a persistent issue in our data stack. Every team had their own way of collecting and structuring data. What was a simple query for one team became a debugging nightmare for another. Discovering the right dataset felt like looking for a needle in a haystack, and standardizing […]】简介 几年前，我们一直在努力解决数据堆栈中的一个持续存在的问题。每个团队都有自己的收集和构建数据的方式。对于一个团队来说简单的查询对于另一个团队来说却变成了调试噩梦。发现正确的数据集就像大海捞针一样，并标准化[...]

item.title: 【Using Local AI models with .NET Aspire】将本地 AI 模型与 .NET Aspire 结合使用
item.description: 【Let's look at how to build and run local AI models with .NET Aspire.】让我们看看如何使用 .NET Aspire 构建和运行本地 AI 模型。

item.title: 【Keep working with non-blocking Code Cleanup】继续使用非阻塞代码清理
item.description: 【Are you tired of waiting for Code Cleanup to finish every time you save your work? Visual Studio 2022 will no longer lock up and get in the way of your tasks as it’s cleaning up the code under the covers. Every developer knows the importance of maintaining clean code. However, the traditional Code Cleanup […]】您是否厌倦了每次保存工作时都等待代码清理完成？ Visual Studio 2022 将不再锁定并妨碍您的任务，因为它正在清理幕后的代码。每个开发人员都知道维护干净代码的重要性。然而，传统的代码清理 [...]

item.title: 【How Global System Integrators can make the most of their GitHub Copilot licenses】全球系统集成商如何充分利用其 GitHub Copilot 许可证
item.description: 【AI-powered code assistant tools like GitHub Copilot have revolutionized the development landscape. We’ve observed significant Copilot adoption among Global System Integrators (GSIs), who are leading the charge in harnessing its potential. While many developers are already utilizing GitHub Copilot in their internal projects, GSI’s are eager to integrate Copilot into their own application development lifecycles. […]】GitHub Copilot 等人工智能驱动的代码助理工具彻底改变了开发环境。我们观察到全球系统集成商 (GSI) 大量采用 Copilot，他们在发挥 Copilot 潜力方面发挥着带头作用。虽然许多开发人员已经在其内部项目中使用 GitHub Copilot，但 GSI 渴望将 Copilot 集成到他们自己的应用程序开发生命周期中。 […]

item.title: 【Learning to read C++ compiler errors: Failing to create a shared_ptr】学习读取 C++ 编译器错误：未能创建共享指针
item.description: 【Understanding what you asked the compiler to do, and why it couldn't comply.】了解您要求编译器做什么，以及为什么它不能遵守。

item.title: 【Boost your Microsoft 365 app performance: Introducing tree shaking in TeamsJS】提升 Microsoft 365 应用性能：TeamsJS 中引入 Tree Shaking
item.description: 【With Microsoft Teams JavaScript client library (TeamsJS) version 2.31.0, we’re excited to make the TeamsJS library fully tree-shakable.】通过 Microsoft Teams JavaScript 客户端库 (TeamsJS) 版本 2.31.0，我们很高兴使 TeamsJS 库完全可进行树摇动。

item.title: 【2024 Python in VS Code Wrapped】2024 VS Code 中的 Python 封装
item.description: 【As the year comes to a close, we would like to take the time to reflect and celebrate the incredible progress the Python extension for VS Code has made in the past year. From merging in top requested features to countless lines of code written and deleted, keep reading to get an inside look to all things】在这一年即将结束之际，我们想花时间回顾和庆祝 VS Code 的 Python 扩展在过去一年中取得的令人难以置信的进步。从合并最需要的功能到编写和删除无数行代码，请继续阅读以深入了解所有内容

item.title: 【Customer Case Study: How to use Elasticsearch Vector Store Connector for Microsoft Semantic Kernel for AI Agent development】客户案例研究：如何使用适用于 Microsoft Semantic Kernel 的 Elasticsearch Vector Store Connector 进行 AI 代理开发
item.description: 【How to use Elasticsearch Vector Store Connector for Microsoft Semantic Kernel for AI Agent development Today we’re excited to feature the Elastic team to share more about their Semantic Kernel Elasticsearch Vector Store connector for Microsoft Semantic Kernel. Read the entire announcement here. I’ll turn it over to Srikanth Manvi and Florian Bernd to dive […]】如何使用适用于 Microsoft 语义内核的 Elasticsearch Vector Store 连接器进行 AI 代理开发 今天，我们很高兴能够与 Elastic 团队分享有关适用于 Microsoft 语义内核的语义内核 Elasticsearch Vector Store 连接器的更多信息。请在此处阅读整个公告。我会将其交给 Srikanth Manvi 和 Florian Bernd 进行潜水 [...]
